original_title: Peter Kay's Animated All Star Band: The Official BBC Children in Need Medley
overview: Big Chris leads a chorus of characters from various animated children's television shows in a medley of seven songs:  1. "Can You Feel It"  2. "Don't Stop"  3. "Jai Ho!"  4. "Tubthumping"  5. "Never Forget"  6. "Hey Jude"  7. "One Day Like This"
title: Peter Kay's Animated All Star Band: The Official BBC Children in Need Medley
